headline: AMGN Q1 Earnings Call: Product Pipeline and Margin Expansion Drive Outperformance
summary: Biotech company Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) reported Q1 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 9.4% year on year to $8.15 billion. The company expects the full year’s revenue to be around $35 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.90 per share was 15% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
